Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Des-Leu13,Ala16-[Lys4]brevinine-1pl (brevinine-1pl I4K,L13/I16 deleted analog, Synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amino acid deletion, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (87.5%) tobrevinine-1plK: 26%; V=F=A: 13%.Activity: S.aureus NCTC 6538 or MRSA 12,493 (MIC >128 uM), E.faecium NCTC 12,697 (MIC >128 uM), E. coli ATCC 8739 (MIC 32 uM), K.pneumoniae ATCC 43,816 (MIC >128 uM), P.aeruginosa ATCC CRM 9027 (MIC >128 uM), A.baumannii BAA 747 (MIC >128 uM), and C.albicans ATCC 10,231 (MIC >128 uM). MBC same for E. coli.Structure: random coil in buffer NH4Ac and helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: horse RBC: HC50 >128 uM, less hemo.lytic.
Literature Information.Author: Wang J, Hu J, Pu W, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M, Wang L. 2024
Literature Information.Reference: Comput Struct Biotechnol J. 2024 Sep 19;23:3391-3406. doi: 10.1016/j.csbj.2024.09.006.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Discovery, Development and Optimisation of a Novel Frog Antimicrobial Peptide with Combined Mode of Action Against Drug-resistant Bacteria
